name: REMOVED_CLAIM_PX
description: This table contains procedures removed from this claim adjustment.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim value record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REMOVED_CLAIM_PX
columns.description: Contains the procedures that have been removed from this claim adjustment.
